Structs/ScaleAndAlphaExpansion.html#/s:1.name: default
Structs/ScaleAndAlphaExpansion.html#/s:1.abstract: Returns a ScaleAndAlphaExpansion instance with default expansion options.

Structs/SwipeExpansionAnimationTimingPar.name: default
Structs/SwipeExpansionAnimationTimingPar.abstract: Returns a SwipeExpansionAnimationTimingParameters instance with default animation parameters.

Structs/SwipeExpansionAnimationTimingPar.name: delay
Structs/SwipeExpansionAnimationTimingPar.abstract: The delay before starting the expansion animation.

Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.name: transitionStyle
Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.abstract: The transition style. Transition is the style of how the action buttons are exposed during the swipe.

Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.name: expansionStyle
Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.abstract: The expansion style. Expansion is the behavior when the cell is swiped past a defined threshold.

Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.name: expansionDelegate
Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.abstract: The object that is notified when expansion changes.

Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.name: backgroundColor
Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.abstract: The background color behind the action buttons.

Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.name: buttonVerticalAlignment
Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.abstract: The vertical alignment mode used for when a button image and title are present.

Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.name: buttonPadding
Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.abstract: The amount of space, in points, between the border and the button image or title.

Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.name: buttonSpacing
Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.abstract: The amount of space, in points, between the button image and the button title.

Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.name: init()
Structs/SwipeOptions.html#/s:12SwipeCell.abstract: Constructs a new SwipeOptions instance with default options.

Structs/ScaleTransition.html#/s:12SwipeC.name: default
Structs/ScaleTransition.html#/s:12SwipeC.abstract: Returns a ScaleTransition instance with default transition options.

Structs/ScaleTransition.html#/s:12SwipeC.name: initialScale
Structs/ScaleTransition.html#/s:12SwipeC.abstract: The initial scale factor used before the action button percent visible is greater than the threshold.

Structs/ScaleTransition.html#/s:12SwipeC.name: threshold
Structs/ScaleTransition.html#/s:12SwipeC.abstract: The percent visible threshold that triggers the scaling animation.

Structs/SwipeActionTransitioningContext..name: setBackgroundColor(_:)
Structs/SwipeActionTransitioningContext..abstract: Sets the background color behind the action button.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/FillOptions/.name: with
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/FillOptions/.abstract: The action handler is invoked with the fill animation.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/FillOptions/.name: after
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/FillOptions/.abstract: The action handler is invoked after the fill animation completes.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/FillOptions/.name: HandlerInvocationTiming
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/FillOptions/.abstract: Describes when the action handler will be invoked with respect to the fill animation.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/FillOptions..name: autoFulFillmentStyle
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/FillOptions..abstract: The fulfillment style describing how expansion should be resolved once the action has been fulfilled.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/FillOptions..name: timing
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/FillOptions..abstract: The timing which specifies when the action handler will be invoked with respect to the fill animation.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/CompletionAn.name: fill
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/CompletionAn.abstract: The expansion will completely fill the item.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/CompletionAn.name: bounce
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/CompletionAn.abstract: The expansion will bounce back from the trigger point and hide the action view, resetting the item.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/Trigger.html.name: touchThreshold
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/Trigger.html.abstract: The trigger is specified by a touch occuring past the supplied percentage in the superview.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/Trigger.html.name: overscroll
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/Trigger.html.abstract: The trigger is specified by the distance in points past the fully exposed action view.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/Target.html#.name: percentage
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/Target.html#.abstract: The target is specified by a percentage.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/Target.html#.name: edgeInset
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/Target.html#.abstract: The target is specified by a edge inset.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.name: selection
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: The default action performs a selection-type behavior. The cell bounces back to its unopened state upon selection and the row remains in the table/collection view.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.name: destructive
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: The default action performs a destructive behavior. The cell is removed from the table/collection view in an animated fashion.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.name: destructiveAfterFill
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: The default action performs a destructive behavior after the fill animation completes. The cell is removed from the table/collection view in an animated fashion.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.name: fill
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: The default action performs a fill behavior.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.name: destructive(automaticallyDelete:timing:)
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: Returns a SwipeExpansionStyle instance for the default action which peforms destructive behavior with the specified options.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.name: target
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: The relative target expansion threshold. Expansion will occur at the specified value.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.name: additionalTriggers
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: Additional triggers to useful for determining if expansion should occur.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.name: elasticOverscroll
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: Specifies if buttons should expand to fully fill overscroll, or expand at a percentage relative to the overscroll.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.name: minimumTargetOverscroll
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: Specifies the minimum amount of overscroll required if the configured target is less than the fully exposed action view.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.name: targetOverscrollElasticity
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: The amount of elasticity applied when dragging past the expansion target.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/Target.html.name: Target
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/Target.html.abstract: Describes the relative target expansion threshold. Expansion will occur at the specified value.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/Trigger.html.name: Trigger
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/Trigger.html.abstract: Describes additional triggers to useful for determining if expansion should occur.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/FillOptions..name: FillOptions
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle/FillOptions..abstract: Specifies the options for the fill completion animation.

Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html.name: SwipeExpansionStyle
Structs/SwipeExpansionStyle.html.abstract: Describes the expansion style. Expansion is the behavior when the cell is swiped past a defined threshold.

Structs/SwipeActionTransitioningContext..name: SwipeActionTransitioningContext
Structs/SwipeActionTransitioningContext..abstract: The SwipeActionTransitioningContext type provides information relevant to a specific action as transitioning occurs.

Structs/ScaleTransition.html.name: ScaleTransition
Structs/ScaleTransition.html.abstract: A scale transition object drives the custom appearance of actions during transition.

Structs/SwipeOptions.html.name: SwipeOptions
Structs/SwipeOptions.html.abstract: The SwipeOptions class provides options for transistion and expansion behavior for swiped cell.

Structs/SwipeExpansionAnimationTimingPar.name: SwipeExpansionAnimationTimingParameters
Structs/SwipeExpansionAnimationTimingPar.abstract: Specifies timing information for the overall expansion animation.

Structs/ScaleAndAlphaExpansion.html.name: ScaleAndAlphaExpansion
Structs/ScaleAndAlphaExpansion.html.abstract: A scale and alpha expansion object drives the custom appearance of the effected actions during expansion.

Protocols/SwipeExpanding.html#/s:12Swipe.name: animationTimingParameters(buttons:expanding:)
Protocols/SwipeExpanding.html#/s:12Swipe.abstract: Asks your object for the animation timing parameters.

Protocols/SwipeExpanding.html#/s:12Swipe.name: actionButton(_:didChange:otherActionButtons:)
Protocols/SwipeExpanding.html#/s:12Swipe.abstract: Tells your object when the expansion state is changing.

Protocols/SwipeActionTransitioning.html#.name: didTransition(with:)
Protocols/SwipeActionTransitioning.html#.abstract: Tells the delegate that transition change has occured.

Protocols/SwipeTableViewCellDelegate.htm.name: tableView(_:editActionsForRowAt:for:)
Protocols/SwipeTableViewCellDelegate.htm.abstract: Asks the delegate for the actions to display in response to a swipe in the specified row.

Protocols/SwipeTableViewCellDelegate.htm.name: tableView(_:editActionsOptionsForRowAt:for:)
Protocols/SwipeTableViewCellDelegate.htm.abstract: Asks the delegate for the display options to be used while presenting the action buttons.

Protocols/SwipeTableViewCellDelegate.htm.name: tableView(_:willBeginEditingRowAt:for:)
Protocols/SwipeTableViewCellDelegate.htm.abstract: Tells the delegate that the table view is about to go into editing mode.

Protocols/SwipeTableViewCellDelegate.htm.name: tableView(_:didEndEditingRowAt:for:)
Protocols/SwipeTableViewCellDelegate.htm.abstract: Tells the delegate that the table view has left editing mode.

Protocols/SwipeTableViewCellDelegate.htm.name: visibleRect(for:)
Protocols/SwipeTableViewCellDelegate.htm.abstract: Asks the delegate for visibile rectangle of the table view, which is used to ensure swipe actions are vertically centered within the visible portion of the cell.

Protocols/SwipeCollectionViewCellDelegat.name: collectionView(_:editActionsForItemAt:for:)
Protocols/SwipeCollectionViewCellDelegat.abstract: Asks the delegate for the actions to display in response to a swipe in the specified item.

Protocols/SwipeCollectionViewCellDelegat.name: collectionView(_:editActionsOptionsForItemAt:for:)
Protocols/SwipeCollectionViewCellDelegat.abstract: Asks the delegate for the display options to be used while presenting the action buttons.

Protocols/SwipeCollectionViewCellDelegat.name: collectionView(_:willBeginEditingItemAt:for:)
Protocols/SwipeCollectionViewCellDelegat.abstract: Tells the delegate that the collection view is about to go into editing mode.

Protocols/SwipeCollectionViewCellDelegat.name: collectionView(_:didEndEditingItemAt:for:)
Protocols/SwipeCollectionViewCellDelegat.abstract: Tells the delegate that the collection view has left editing mode.

Protocols/SwipeCollectionViewCellDelegat.name: visibleRect(for:)
Protocols/SwipeCollectionViewCellDelegat.abstract: Asks the delegate for visibile rectangle of the collection view, which is used to ensure swipe actions are vertically centered within the visible portion of the item.

Protocols/SwipeCollectionViewCellDelegat.name: SwipeCollectionViewCellDelegate
Protocols/SwipeCollectionViewCellDelegat.abstract: The SwipeCollectionViewCellDelegate protocol is adopted by an object that manages the display of action buttons when the item is swiped.

Protocols/SwipeTableViewCellDelegate.htm.name: SwipeTableViewCellDelegate
Protocols/SwipeTableViewCellDelegate.htm.abstract: The SwipeTableViewCellDelegate protocol is adopted by an object that manages the display of action buttons when the cell is swiped.

Protocols/SwipeActionTransitioning.html.name: SwipeActionTransitioning
Protocols/SwipeActionTransitioning.html.abstract: Adopt the SwipeActionTransitioning protocol in objects that implement custom appearance of actions during transition.

Protocols/SwipeExpanding.html.name: SwipeExpanding
Protocols/SwipeExpanding.html.abstract: Adopt the SwipeExpanding protocol in objects that implement custom appearance of actions during expansion.

Enums/SwipeVerticalAlignment.html#/s:12S.name: centerFirstBaseline
Enums/SwipeVerticalAlignment.html#/s:12S.abstract: All actions will be inspected and the tallest image and first baseline offset of title text will be used to create the alignment rectangle.

Enums/SwipeVerticalAlignment.html#/s:12S.name: center
Enums/SwipeVerticalAlignment.html#/s:12S.abstract: The action button image height and full title height are used to create the aligment rectange.

Enums/SwipeTransitionStyle.html#/s:12Swi.name: border
Enums/SwipeTransitionStyle.html#/s:12Swi.abstract: The visible action area is equally divide between all action buttons.

Enums/SwipeTransitionStyle.html#/s:12Swi.name: drag
Enums/SwipeTransitionStyle.html#/s:12Swi.abstract: The visible action area is dragged, pinned to the cell, with each action button fully sized as it is exposed.

Enums/SwipeTransitionStyle.html#/s:12Swi.name: reveal
Enums/SwipeTransitionStyle.html#/s:12Swi.abstract: The visible action area sits behind the cell, pinned to the edge of the table/collection view, and is revealed as the cell is dragged aside.

Enums/ExpansionFulfillmentStyle.html#/s:.name: delete
Enums/ExpansionFulfillmentStyle.html#/s:.abstract: Implies the item will be deleted upon action fulfillment.

Enums/ExpansionFulfillmentStyle.html#/s:.name: reset
Enums/ExpansionFulfillmentStyle.html#/s:.abstract: Implies the item will be reset and the actions view hidden upon action fulfillment.

Enums/SwipeActionStyle.html#/s:12SwipeCe.name: default
Enums/SwipeActionStyle.html#/s:12SwipeCe.abstract: Apply a style that reflects standard non-destructive actions.

Enums/SwipeActionStyle.html#/s:12SwipeCe.name: destructive
Enums/SwipeActionStyle.html#/s:12SwipeCe.abstract: Apply a style that reflects destructive actions.

Enums/SwipeActionStyle.html.name: SwipeActionStyle
Enums/SwipeActionStyle.html.abstract: Constants that help define the appearance of action buttons.

Enums/ExpansionFulfillmentStyle.html.name: ExpansionFulfillmentStyle
Enums/ExpansionFulfillmentStyle.html.abstract: Describes how expansion should be resolved once the action has been fulfilled.

Enums/SwipeTransitionStyle.html.name: SwipeTransitionStyle
Enums/SwipeTransitionStyle.html.abstract: Describes the transition style. Transition is the style of how the action buttons are exposed during the swipe.

Enums/SwipeActionsOrientation.html.name: SwipeActionsOrientation
Enums/SwipeActionsOrientation.html.abstract: Describes which side of the cell that the action buttons will be displayed.

Enums/SwipeVerticalAlignment.html.name: SwipeVerticalAlignment
Enums/SwipeVerticalAlignment.html.abstract: Describes the alignment mode used when action button images and titles are provided.

Classes/SwipeTableViewCell.html#/s:12Swi.name: delegate
Classes/SwipeTableViewCell.html#/s:12Swi.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate of the SwipeTableViewCell.

Classes/SwipeTableViewCell.html#/s:12Swi.name: swipeOffset
Classes/SwipeTableViewCell.html#/s:12Swi.abstract: The point at which the origin of the cell is offset from the non-swiped origin.

Classes/SwipeTableViewCell.html#/s:12Swi.name: hideSwipe(animated:completion:)
Classes/SwipeTableViewCell.html#/s:12Swi.abstract: Hides the swipe actions and returns the cell to center.

Classes/SwipeTableViewCell.html#/s:12Swi.name: showSwipe(orientation:animated:completion:)
Classes/SwipeTableViewCell.html#/s:12Swi.abstract: Shows the swipe actions for the specified orientation.

Classes/SwipeTableViewCell.html#/s:12Swi.name: setSwipeOffset(_:animated:completion:)
Classes/SwipeTableViewCell.html#/s:12Swi.abstract: The point at which the origin of the cell is offset from the non-swiped origin.

Classes/SwipeCollectionViewCell.html#/s:.name: delegate
Classes/SwipeCollectionViewCell.html#/s:.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate of the SwipeCollectionViewCell.

Classes/SwipeCollectionViewCell.html#/s:.name: swipeOffset
Classes/SwipeCollectionViewCell.html#/s:.abstract: The point at which the origin of the cell is offset from the non-swiped origin.

Classes/SwipeCollectionViewCell.html#/s:.name: hideSwipe(animated:completion:)
Classes/SwipeCollectionViewCell.html#/s:.abstract: Hides the swipe actions and returns the cell to center.

Classes/SwipeCollectionViewCell.html#/s:.name: showSwipe(orientation:animated:completion:)
Classes/SwipeCollectionViewCell.html#/s:.abstract: Shows the swipe actions for the specified orientation.

Classes/SwipeCollectionViewCell.html#/s:.name: setSwipeOffset(_:animated:completion:)
Classes/SwipeCollectionViewCell.html#/s:.abstract: The point at which the origin of the cell is offset from the non-swiped origin.

Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.name: style
Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.abstract: The style applied to the action button.

Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.name: transitionDelegate
Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.abstract: The object that is notified as transitioning occurs.

Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.name: font
Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.abstract: The font to use for the title of the action button.

Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.name: textColor
Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.abstract: The text color of the action button.

Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.name: highlightedTextColor
Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.abstract: The highlighted text color of the action button.

Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.name: image
Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.abstract: The image used for the action button.

Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.name: highlightedImage
Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.abstract: The highlighted image used for the action button.

Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.name: handler
Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.abstract: The closure to execute when the user taps the button associated with this action.

Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.name: backgroundColor
Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.abstract: The background color of the action button.

Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.name: highlightedBackgroundColor
Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.abstract: The highlighted background color of the action button.

Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.name: backgroundEffect
Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.abstract: The visual effect to apply to the action button.

Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.name: hidesWhenSelected
Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether the actions menu is automatically hidden upon selection.

Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.name: fulfill(with:)
Classes/SwipeAction.html#/s:12SwipeCellK.abstract: Calling this method performs the configured expansion completion animation including deletion, if necessary. Calling this method more than once has no effect.

Classes/SwipeAction.html.name: SwipeAction
Classes/SwipeAction.html.abstract: The SwipeAction object defines a single action to present when the user swipes horizontally in a table/collection item.

Classes/SwipeCollectionViewCell.html.name: SwipeCollectionViewCell
Classes/SwipeCollectionViewCell.html.abstract: The SwipeCollectionViewCell class extends UICollectionViewCell and provides more flexible options for cell swiping behavior.

Classes/SwipeTableViewCell.html.name: SwipeTableViewCell
Classes/SwipeTableViewCell.html.abstract: The SwipeTableViewCell class extends UITableViewCell and provides more flexible options for cell swiping behavior.
